content: 2cm 16 5cm from cast-on edge crown decrease for crown as follows beginning at the indicated round based on size ignore the decrease rounds above the size you are knitting as they will not apply to your particular hat remember to knit all of the even numbered rounds and decrease on the odd numbered rounds switch to double pointed needles when necessary baby start decreases on round 9 toddler start decreases on round 5 child start decreases on round 3 adult small start decreases on round 5 adult medium start decreases on round 1 adult large start decreases on round 1 round 1 *k6 k2tog repeat from * to end round 2 and all even rounds knit round 3 *k5 k2tog repeat from * to end round 5 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end round 7 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to end round 9 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end round 11 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end round 13 *k2tog repeat from * to end finish cut yarn leaving at least a 6 tail pull yarn through remaining stitches to cinch top of hat closed secure top of hat weave in ends on inside of hat add a pom pom if desired this tutorial is helpful for pom pom newbies… http //www danamadeit com/2010/12/pom-poms-a-very-simple-tutorial html copyright 2015 jackie vlcek / luna grey fiber arts all rights reserved pattern is intended for personal use only for questions contact the designer at www lunagreyfiberarts com
